instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap the Bluetooth switch to ON position. Tap Bluetooth . If necessary, make the device you want to pair with visible now so it will appear in your device list. If the device appears in the list, tap it to pair with handset. Otherwise tap SEARCH FOR DEVICES at the bottom of screen. When the device appears in the list, tap it to pair with handset.
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Tap the Bluetooth switch to the ON or OFF position.
